content.question: Which expression is equal to the equivalent capacitance of the two capacitors?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator kappa script lowercase E sub 0, end subscript, times A, and denominator, open parenthesis, kappa plus 1, close parenthesis, times d, end fraction" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mi>κ</mi><msub><mi>ε</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>A</mi></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>κ</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator script lowercase E sub 0, end subscript, times A, and denominator, open parenthesis, kappa plus 1, close parenthesis, times d, end fraction" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>ε</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>A</mi></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>κ</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator, open parenthesis, kappa plus 1, close parenthesis, times script lowercase E sub 0, end subscript, times A, and denominator d" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>κ</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><msub><mi>ε</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>A</mi></mrow><mi>d</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 2 kappa script lowercase E sub 0, end subscript, times A, and denominator d" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>κ</mi><msub><mi>ε</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>A</mi></mrow><mi>d</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator kappa script lowercase E sub 0, end subscript, times A, and denominator, open parenthesis, kappa plus 1, close parenthesis, times d, end fraction" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mi>κ</mi><msub><mi>ε</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>A</mi></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>κ</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
